author: wn.com
title: Sabres goalie Lehner to be evaluated after MRI (NHL - National Hockey League)
text: ( Source : NHL - National Hockey League ) It is unknown how long Buffalo Sabres goalie Robin Lehner will be out after he sustained a lower-body injury in the season opener Thursday. 'Robin Lehner will have more evaluation done today and
